meanings.definition: relating to or denoting the union of gametes from individuals that are not closely related
meanings.sent1: In nature, some plants reproduce through heterogamous fertilization.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the heterogamous mating patterns of the insects.
meanings.sent3: The heterogamous meeting of the cells was like a family reunion with distant relatives.
meanings.sent4: The heterogamous combination of genes led to a unique offspring.
meanings.sent5: The concept of heterogamous reproduction can be complex but fascinating to learn about.

meanings.definition: exhibiting differences in size, shape, or structure between male and female organs
meanings.sent1: The heterogamous flowers displayed distinct characteristics between male and female parts.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the heterogamous features of the sculpture in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The heterogamous appearance of the animals made them stand out in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The heterogamous design of the building symbolized unity in diversity.
meanings.sent5: The heterogamous shapes in the painting created a visually striking contrast.
